articles.author: Sean O'Kane
articles.title: Volkswagen, BMW fined $1 billion for colluding to make dirtier cars - The Verge
articles.description: German automakers spent years holding secret meetings where they agreed to slow the deployment of clean car technology. This anti-competitive behavior resulted in new fines from the European Union, which has been investigating the allegations for four years.
articles.content:
Mercedes-Benz parent company Daimler was involved, too, but it blew the whistle

articles.title: Football: England into Euro 2020 final after ending Danish dream run - CNA
articles.description: England and their long-suffering fans finally have the chance to add another trophy to the 1966 World Cup after they overcame Denmark 2-1 in extra-time on Wednesday to reach the European Championship final for the first time.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: 'Toughest game I ever played' - Bonucci hails Italy heart after Azzurri 'suffer' through win over Spain - Goal.com
articles.description: Newly-hired RB Leipzig manager Jesse Marsch says that Caden Clark has both the personality and the playing ability to shine in Germany as he said the American teenager has "borderline cockiness" that will help him adjust to the pressures of Europe.
